article_text:
For TPM readers, 2014 was a year of Ann Coulter making an epic fail on Twitter, Princeton academics declaring the U.S. is no longer a democracy, and Supreme Court Justice Antonin Scalia making a serious error in a dissent and more.

Below is the list of the most-read stories at TPM in 2014:
